name: Entasy Online
description:
Welcome to Entasy Online adventurer!

Entasy is a fantastic world that has been attacked by creatures. Your goal is saving Entasy World from these creatures and become a hero! Natives of Entasy World needs you.

It is a multiplayer game that you may get quests from the characters to accomplish. You will get stronger equipment by defeating creatures in time. You can also buy and sell items on market to get gold or spend. Trade any item you want with players.

Features:
  • Use sword, bow, or magic.
  • Get skills points each level and use 20 different skills.
  • Get 2 stat points each level and improve your character.
  • Reset your skill and stat points any time.
  • Full item and equipment system (helmet, chestplate, pants, boots, gloves, shield/rune, necklace, and ring).
  • Complete quests that npcs have.
  • Trade items with players.
  • Add friends to your friend list and enjoy playing with them.
  • Join groups with maximum 4 players.
  • Customize your character (head, hair style, eye, glove, cloth, shoes, sword, bow, staff)
